moves.name: Thunderbolt
moves.effect: Has a chance (10%) of leaving the target paralyzed.

moves.name: X Sp. Atk
moves.effect: Raises the user’s Sp. Atk by 2 stat ranks.

moves.name: Race You!
moves.effect: Raises the user’s Speed by 2 stat ranks. Raises the user’s critical-hit rate by 1 stat rank.

moves.name: Thunder
moves.effect: Never misses when the weather is rainy. Has a chance (30%) of leaving the target paralyzed.

passives.name: Lithe
passives.description: Prevents the user from getting paralyzed.

passives.name: Power Reserves 2
passives.description: Powers up the user’s moves when in a pinch.
